job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgta fintech company in the financial services industry is looking for machine learning nlp engineers to join their machine learning ai predictive analytics team in this role you will be responsible for leading improvements in core machine learning and aidriven products at any given time you will be working alongside a team of about other engineers and tasked with up to two projects most of the work involves developing datadriven and algorithmdriven models and software products specifically working with various news feeds this position will be a contract to permanent onboarding model with benefits offered during the contract phase ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtdesired skills and experienceampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtmust have plus years of work experience after obtaining a masters degree or phd in computer science statistics mathematics economics or other quantitative fields with a focus on machine learning ai nlp deep learning and or data driven statistical analysis and modelingltpgtltpgtprevious experience working as an nlp engineer natural language processingltpgtltpgtin depth knowledge of artificial intelligence ai and machine learning libraries tensorflow pytorch keras numpyltpgtltpgtstrong programing skills years in pythonltpgtltpgtexperience developing endtoend machine learning prototypesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtplussesltstronggtltpgtltpgtsecondary programming languages java cc r or scalaltpgtltpgtbig data frameworks hadoopltpgt
